hypothesis_content.title: BTC Volatility Compression Breakout with Volume Confirmation
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC trades within a 10-day Bollinger Band width percentile below 20 (high compression) during a NEUTRAL regime, a daily close above the 20-day upper Bollinger Band with volume > 1.5x 20-day average will lead to a directional trend continuation in the breakout direction for the next 5-7 days.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Extended periods of low volatility (compression) during neutral regimes often precede explosive moves. Volume confirmation filters out false breakouts. The neutral regime provides a 'coiled spring' environment without strong directional bias.
entry_conditions: BTC 10-day Bollinger Band width (2 std) percentile < 20
Daily candle closes above 20-day upper Bollinger Band

exit_conditions.take_profit: 5% gain from entry or 7-day hold, whichever comes first

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: Breakout direction fails to sustain > 3 days OR more than 40% of signals result in immediate reversal below middle BB within 2 days.
